snippet: Kenya's domestic security minister said Monday that 379 pastoralist herders have been arrested for invading ranches that led to the killing of a British farmer over the weekend....

headline.main: U.N. Nuclear Chief Says Confident of U.S. Cooperation on Iran Deal
headline.print_headline: U.N. Nuclear Chief Says Confident of U.S. Cooperation on Iran Deal

lead_paragraph: Kenya's domestic security minister said Monday that 379 pastoralist herders have been arrested for invading ranches that led to the killing of a British farmer over the weekend.
